title: square rounded both fonts
content:
C's are different so can't be same font

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [PRO.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830132048/http:/typophile.com/files/PRO.jpg) | 86.34 KB |
author: pajdel

comments.content:
"PR CON" is [Stop](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830132048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/stop/), by Aldo Novarese.  
"Electrical" looks like [ITC Bolt](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830132048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bolt/).

Both have been manually stretched (ugly).

PR CON: [Stop MN](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830132048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itfmecanorma/stop) by Aldo Novarese  
ELECTRICAL: [Bolt ITC](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830132048/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/itc-bolt) by Ronne Bonder and Tom Carnase
